How valuable is rushing for each QB?

Total EPA vs Total Rushing EPA

Daniel Jones:
Total EPA = 49.6 (10th)
Total Rushing EPA = 25.7 (4th)

More than half of Jonesâ€™ EPA comes from rushing!

If you subtract out EPA from all QB runs, Jones would rank 14th in EPA/play

#nflverse https://t.co/tMuPev9sDr

Some good conversation today about DTs that specialize in stopping the run, so I wanted to get a better picture of who those players are.

Up & right are players who are better against the run and play in run-heavy situations, down & left is the opposite.

Data: PFF & #nflverse https://t.co/eBllbP1ZYP
Week 11 of the #nfl season kicks off tonight, so let's take a look at what my models sees as the current state of the league #nflverse #rstats
Jumping ahead to Week 11 picks, the model likes @packers, despite conventional wisdom, and sees a @Saints victory over a reeling @RamsNFL team.  #nflverse https://t.co/mlJh3tp2vZ
